subject: Re: ANT Can't find Tools.jar
msgSnippet: ... tool.jar) ... Damian, thanks for you help. Just in case someone else runs into the same problem. I first tried copying the tools.jar file into the JRE
messageBody:
"Damian Murphy" <damodai@...> wrote:
>
> I think that your problem is that you have installed a JRE on your
> machine and this is what is referenced in your windows
> registry.(HKEY_CURRENT_USERS->Software->Javasoft->Java Runtime
> Environment) this is where the jre1.5.0_06\lib is found.
> As you point out tools.jar is not part of this jre.
> You can try
> option 1)adding the tools.jar file to the jre1.5.0_06\lib folder
> option 2)uninstalling the JRE and installing a JDK(JDK has the
tool.jar)
> option 3) changing the entry in the registry
>
Damian, thanks for you help. Just in case someone else runs into the
same problem. I first tried copying the tools.jar file into the JRE
directory, that got me past the first problem, but then the compiles
failed, because they were also looking in the JRE directory. Then I
tried modifying the registry. That still didn't work. In the end I
had to uninstall the JRE.

Thanks again
Janet
